allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Linked BUY transaction deletion with automatic reversal

- BUY transactions now properly link to their SELL counterpart
- Deleting from either side \(BUY or SELL\) reverses both legs
- Warning popup explains what will be deleted
- Closed positions are properly cleaned up on reversal
- Fixed P&L calculation to use correct source currency \(CHF, EUR, etc.\)
- Fixed detectAssetNativeCurrency to recognize currency tickers
- Removed undo notification feature \(user confirms via popup\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
